languages.text: {n}С помощью портативных инструментов настройки передатчика вы аккуратно вынимаете перегревшуюся энергобатарею из вокса, и поток звуков утихает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}С помощью портативных инструментов настройки передатчика вы аккуратно вынимаете перегревшуюся энергобатарею из вокса, и поток звуков утихает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С помощью портативных инструментов настройки передатчика вы аккуратно вынимаете перегревшуюся энергобатарею из вокса, и поток звуков утихает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With the help of a portable toolkit for vox-caster finetuning, you carefully take out the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}
{n}With the help of a portable toolkit for vox-caster finetuning, you carefully take out the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}
{n}With the help of a portable toolkit for vox-caster fine-tuning, you carefully take out the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}
{n}With the help of a portable toolkit for vox-caster fine-tuning, you carefully take out the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}
{n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}
{n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con ayuda de un juego de herramientas portátil para vocoamplificadores, extraes cuidadosamente la batería sobrecalentada del voco y las ondas sonoras cesan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con ayuda de un juego de herramientas portátil para realizar ajustes en vocoamplificadores, extraes cuidadosamente la batería sobrecalentada del voco y las ondas sonoras cesan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你使用便携式音阵工具包，小心翼翼地从音阵装置中取出过热的电池，声音随之消失了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你使用便携式通讯器的微调工具包，小心翼翼地从音阵装置中取出过热的电池，声音随之消失了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'aide d'un kit de réparation, vous retirez avec précaution la batterie en surchauffe de l'émetteur vox et les crachotements sonores s'atténuent avant de cesser totalement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'aide d'un kit de réparation, vous retirez avec précaution la batterie en surchauffe de l'émetteur-vox et les crachotements sonores s'atténuent avant de cesser totalement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音声通信送受信装置の微調整ができる携帯ツールキットの助けを借りて、ヴォクスからオーバーヒートしたバッテリーを慎重に取り出すと、音の波が静まる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音声通信送受信装置の微調整ができる携帯ツールキットの助けを借りて、ヴォクスからオーバーヒートしたバッテリーを慎重に取り出すと、音の波が静まる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit Hilfe eines tragbaren Werkzeugkits für die Feinkalibrierung von Vox-Transmittern nimmst du vorsichtig die überhitzte Batterie aus dem Vox, und die Welle an Geräuschen stirbt ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit Hilfe eines tragbaren Werkzeugkits für die Feinkalibrierung von Vox-Transmittern nimmst du vorsichtig die überhitzte Batterie aus dem Vox, und die Welle an Geräuschen stirbt ab.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Portatif bir voksyayar alet takımı sayesinde aşırı ısınan bataryayı vokstan dikkatle çıkarıyorsun. Ses dalgaları kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the help of a portable vox-caster toolkit, you carefully remove the overheated battery from the vox, and the wave of sounds dies down.{/n}
